message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. Hope you accept! We can work out a better deal in the next round.
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to go down to 60/40. This is a fair split, considering the inflation.
You're getting closer to my target, but I want more
I'm going to take the risk. Let's split it 50/50. We both have a decent amount, and we can avoid further inflation.
